config_ui_counter_enabled_description: Enable display of kill counter and modifier list
config_ui_counter_custom_description: Enable custom placement of kill counter and modifier list
config_ui_counter_custom_x_description: X position of kill counter and modifier list
config_ui_counter_custom_y_description: Y position of kill counter and modifier list
config_ui_counter_scale_description: Scale of kill counter and modifier list
config_ui_timer_custom_description: Enable custom placement of the timer
config_ui_talisman_mode_enabled_descript: Enable display of the current talisman indicator
config_ui_talisman_mode_custom_descripti: Enable custom placement of the current talisman indicator
config_ui_talisman_mode_custom_x_descrip: X position of the current talisman indicator
config_ui_talisman_mode_custom_y_descrip: Y position of the current talisman indicator
config_ui_talisman_mode_scale_descriptio: Scale of the current talisman indicator
config_modifiers_enabled_description:
Enable Modifiers.
 Enable or disable modifiers that affect the miniboss fight.
config_modifiers_start_death_description:
The death number for modifiers to appear.
 Modifiers will start to apply after this amount of miniboss deaths. If set to 0, modifiers will be applied at the start of the fight.
config_repeating_enabled_description:
Repeating modifiers.
 Modifiers can be repeated multiple times in a row.
config_modifiers_speed_enabled_descripti:
Speed Modifier.
 +20% miniboss speed increase. Stacks multiplicatively with speed scaling.
config_modifiers_timer_enabled_descripti:
Timer Modifier.
 Starts a timer to kill the miniboss. When the time runs out, Yi dies.
config_modifiers_parry_damage_enabled_de:
Modifier to disable imprecise parries.
 Imprecise parries do not protect Yi.
config_modifiers_internal_damage_enabled:
Internal Damage Accumulation Modifier.
 Yi accumulates internal damage over time. In exchange, Yi will not receive internal damage from parries of attacks of the modifier's owner.
config_modifiers_regeneration_enabled_de:
Regeneration modifier.
The enemy will slowly regenerate their health. The total health restored is equal to half of the total health in all phases.
config_modifiers_knockback_enabled_descr:
Knockback modifier.
 Knockback from enemy attacks is doubled.
config_modifiers_knockout_enabled_descri:
Knock out modifier. 
 All attacks that hit apply strongest knock out force to Yi
config_modifiers_random_arrow_enabled_de:
Random arrow modifier.
 The selected arrow changes randomly after shooting. It cannot be changed by player.
config_modifiers_random_talisman_enabled:
Random talisman modifier.
 The selected talisman changes randomly after exlosion. It cannot be changed by player.
(Current talisman mode will display above the selected arrow, it may take few uses to display)
config_modifiers_endurance_enabled_descr:
Endurance modifier.
 Enemy cannot be stunned. The stun after parrying some attacks and Lady Ethereal's stun will still apply.
config_modifiers_qi_shield_enabled_descr:
Qi shield modifier.
 Enemy will receive shield after talisman explosion.
config_modifiers_cooldown_shield_enabled:
Cooldown Shield Modifier.
The enemy will constantly receive a shield with a slight delay.
config_modifiers_distance_shield_enabled:
Distance Shield Modifier.
The enemy will receive a shield if they are far away from the Yi.
config_modifiers_qi_overload_enabled_des:
Qi Overload Modifier.
Gaining Qi charges above the maximum will deal internal damage. If you have no health, the accumulated charges will be lost upon gaining six extra charges. Spending Chi charges resets the extra charges counter.
config_modifiers_yanlao_gun_enabled_desc:
Yanlao's Gun Modifier'.
 Yanlao's gun will target Yi.
config_modifiers_qi_bomb_enabled_descrip:
Qi Bomb Modifier.
 Two bombs will appear on Yi after the talisman explosion.
config_modifiers_shield_break_bomb_enabl:
Shield Break Bomb Modifier.
 Two bombs will appear on Yi after the enemy's shield is broken. The enemy can only receive this modifier if they have any shield modifier.
config_modifiers_qi_overload_bomb_enable:
Qi Overload Bomb Modifier.
 One bomb will appear on Yi after reaching the maximum Qi charges.
config_modifiers_qi_depletion_bomb_enabl:
Qi Depletion Bomb Modifier.
 Two bombs will appear on Yi after all Qi charges are depleted.
config_modifiers_cooldown_bomb_enabled_d:
Cooldown Bomb Modifier.
 The bomb will periodically spawn on Yi.
config_modifiers_modifiers_enabled_desc: Enables modifiers that make fights more difficult
config_modifiers_start_death_desc: Modifiers will start to apply after this amount of enemy deaths. If set to 0, modifiers will be applied at the start of the fight.
config_modifiers_modifiers_repeat_enable: Modifiers can be repeated multiple times in a row.
config_affect_bosses_desc: Boss enhancement. Bosses will revive, gain modifiers and boosts.
config_boss_deaths_number_desc: Boss will die after this number of deaths.
config_boss_speed_scaling_enabled_desc: Bosses will gain linear speed scaling with each death. Stacked multiplicatively with the random speed scaling and modifiers.
config_boss_speed_scaling_minspeed_desc: The starting value for speed scaling.
config_boss_speed_scaling_steps_cap_desc: How many times starting value can be incremented. Set to -1 for unlimited incrementing.
config_boss_modifiers_scaling_enabled_de: Bosses will receive additional modifiers, with the total number being the sum of the scaling and a random scaling value. When this scaling is enabled, additional modifiers are calculated from a base of 0, so the default amount of one modifier is overwritten. The number of scaling steps is calculated starting from the death of the appearance of modifiers (for example, if modifiers start appearing from the second death, and the boss died four times, then the initial value will be incremented twice)
config_boss_modifiers_scaling_min_number: The starting value for modifiers scaling.
config_boss_modifiers_scaling_steps_cap_: How many times starting value can be incremented. Set to -1 for unlimited incrementing(in case of modifiers, it is still capped by available modifiers number).
config_boss_rand_speed_scaling_enabled_d: Bosses will receive a random speed boost with each death. Stacks multiplicatively with the linear speed scaling and modifiers.
config_boss_rand_speed_scaling_minspeed_: The minimum value for the random speed scaling.
config_boss_rand_speed_scaling_maxspeed_: The maximum value for the random speed boost.
config_boss_rand_modifiers_scaling_enabl: Bosses will receive a random number of modifiers with each death, added to the linear modifier increase.
config_boss_rand_modifiers_scaling_min_d: The minimum value for the random modifiers count.
config_boss_rand_modifiers_scaling_max_d: The maximum value for the random modifiers count.
